RelatedSentence: A woman and her father-in-law were murdered in the capital on Sunday night , allegedly by the woman 's relatives .
They contracted a court marriage around eight months ago , said investigation officer Shams Akbar .
On Sunday night , around seven people from Nadia 's family arrived at her home in Chapar and opened fire , killing Nadia and her father-in-law .
It appears to be a case of honour - killing , he added .
Akbar said a murder case had been registered and the police was trying to identify the attackers , one of whom might be Nadia 's maternal uncle .
